title: Thomas Bels motiues concerning Romish faith and religion.
author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Legate, printer to the Vniversitie of Cambridge. 1593. And are to be sold [by Abraham Kitson] at the signe of the Sunne in Paules Churchyard in London,
notes: Kitson was at the sign of the Sun in 1593.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
